metadata.feature_description: Display comprehensive user activity metrics including rank, reputation, experience, engagement, influence, and contribution statistics

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View activity details for regular user with activities

steps.action: Navigate to Manage > Users in PersonaBar
steps.actual: Users list page displayed with Content Editor and SuperUser Account

steps.action: Click User Activity icon for Content Editor user
steps.expected: Activity details panel expands showing user activity metrics
steps.actual: Activity panel expanded showing Last Active, Rank, Reputation, Experience, Engagement, Influence, Total Contributions, and Recent Activity sections

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify all metrics display correctly (rank, reputation, experience)

steps.action: View activity details panel for Content Editor
steps.expected: Rank, Reputation, and Experience metrics are visible with numeric values

steps.action: View Engagement metric in activity panel
steps.expected: Engagement displays as a percentage value between 0-100 with a progress bar
steps.actual: Engagement: 0 displayed with an empty progress bar (valid 0-100 range)

steps.action: View Influence metric in activity panel
steps.expected: Influence displays as a percentage value with a progress bar
steps.actual: Influence: 0 displayed with an empty progress bar

steps.action: View Total Contributions in activity panel
steps.actual: 0 TOTAL CONTRIBUTIONS displayed correctly in a styled box

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify last active date formatting (relative time)

steps.action: View Last Active field in activity panel
steps.expected: Last Active date is displayed in relative time format (e.g., '60 minutes ago', '1 hour ago')
steps.actual: Last Active: 60 minutes ago - relative time format displayed correctly

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify SuperUser activities cannot be viewed

steps.action: Observe action icons for SuperUser Account row in Users list
steps.expected: User Activity icon should not be present for SuperUser accounts
steps.actual: SuperUser Account row only shows Profile Settings and Account Settings icons - no User Activity icon is present, confirming SuperUser activities are hidden

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify Recent Activity section displays activities

steps.action: View Recent Activity section in activity panel
steps.expected: Recent activities are listed with activity description and source
steps.actual: Recent Activity section shows 'Joined Site 1 hour ago' from 'EVOQ CONTENT LIBRARY'

steps.action: Click Edit Points link in activity panel
steps.expected: Edit mode activates with editable Reputation and Experience fields
steps.actual: Edit Points mode activated showing editable textboxes for Reputation (6) and Experience (7), plus a Notes field and Cancel/Save buttons

steps.action: Click Cancel to exit edit mode
steps.expected: Edit mode deactivates and returns to view mode
steps.actual: Edit mode cancelled successfully, returned to view-only display

observations: Social SKU-specific features (Rank, Engagement, Influence) are displayed, indicating the test environment is running DNNSOCIAL SKU
The Edit Points functionality is available for administrators with the EditPoints permission
Error handling for non-existent users could not be tested via UI as there is no way to navigate to an invalid user's activity - the API would need direct testing
SHOW_USER_ACTIVITY permission testing would require a non-admin user which was not available in the test environment
Data loads successfully from PersonaBar_GetUserActivityDetail stored procedure as evidenced by the network request returning 200 OK
